basics.name: Alessandra Gudoy
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

courses: ICS 211: Introduction to Computer Science II

awards.title: Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.awarder: The University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen residing in Hawaii following the semester they complete high school with a minimum cumulative GPA of 3.7.

awards.title: AP Scholar Award with Distinction
awards.summary: Awarded to students who score on average at least 3.5 on all AP Exams taken and scores of 3 or higher on five or more of these exams.
